SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.areas

Class EnemyRoom

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.areas.BaseRoom
com.csse3200.game.areas.EnemyRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
BossRoom, MainRoom
public abstract class EnemyRoom extends BaseRoom
Abstract class representing a room containing enemies in the game. This class is used as a base for both standard enemy rooms and boss rooms. It extends BaseRoom and adds functionality specific to rooms with hostile entities.

    • getAnimalSpecifications

      protected abstract List<List<String>> getAnimalSpecifications()
      Gets the animal specifications for the room. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define enemy types.

      Parameters:
      area - The game area to spawn the animals/enemies in.
      player - The player entity.
      min - The minimum grid point for spawning.
      max - The maximum grid point for spawning.
